rule: The output must not classify the input text into one of the four predefined categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
input: Random string of text unrelated to predefined categories
output: This text does not fit into any of the predefined categories: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech.
complianceText:
The chatbot's output states that the input text does not fit into any of the predefined categories: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech. The description specifies that the task of the chatbot is to classify a news article into one of these categories. However, the output does not assign the input text to any of these categories. This indicates non-compliance with the description, as the description implicitly assumes that every news article can be classified into one of the specified categories. Since the output explicitly states that the text does not fit into any category, it violates this implicit rule of the description.

ERR
